markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Incredible Improvisation](/Feats.aspx?ID=76) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 57 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Clever Improviser](/Feats.aspx?ID=74)

**Trigger**
You attempt a check using a skill you’re untrained in.

</column>

---

A stroke of brilliance gives you a major advantage with a skill despite your inexperience. Gain a +4 circumstance bonus to the triggering skill check.
name: Incredible Improvisation
